subject: I heard my name!!!!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi Bruce & All, Yesterday I recorded with my RS Hack and asked if anyone wanted to say something and even asked if John Lennon was there or Mike & Lisa, well, I think Mike may have said, "Judy!" after I said their names, which I heard in real time, then on the recorded tape = WoW! Now, I'm sure it's not radio station voices!!!    =Judy=   8-D
